products.name: Cinnamon Wood Elephant
products.description: Handcarved from authentic Ceylon cinnamon wood, this majestic elephant sculpture embodies Sri Lankan heritage. Each piece features intricate detailing that celebrates traditional craftsmanship passed down through generations.

products.name: Royal Blue Porcelain Vase
products.description: A stunning porcelain vase adorned with hand-painted sapphire motifs inspired by Sri Lanka's precious gemstones. This elegant centerpiece brings timeless sophistication to any interior space.

products.name: Lotus Bloom Arrangement
products.description: An exquisite arrangement featuring fresh lotus flowers and tropical foliage native to Sri Lankan waterways. This serene composition brings natural elegance and cultural symbolism to your home.

products.name: Teak Wood Wall Panel
products.description: A magnificent carved teak panel featuring traditional Kandyan era motifs and geometric patterns. This statement piece transforms any wall into a gallery of Sri Lankan artistic heritage.

products.name: Handwoven Palmyra Basket
products.description: Expertly woven from sustainable palmyra palm fibers by skilled artisans from the Northern Province. This versatile basket combines functionality with rustic charm for modern living.

products.name: Ceylon Tea Ceremony Set
products.description: An elegant six-piece porcelain tea set featuring delicate gold leaf accents and tea plantation illustrations. Perfect for hosting authentic Ceylon tea experiences with refined grace.

products.name: Moonstone Terrace Lamp
products.description: Inspired by ancient moonstone carvings found in Anuradhapura, this brass lamp casts enchanting patterns. Its intricate perforations create a mesmerizing play of light and shadow.

products.name: Sandalwood Prayer Box
products.description: A miniature treasure chest carved from fragrant sandalwood with brass inlay work. This sacred keepsake box brings tranquility and traditional elegance to your personal altar or dresser.

products.name: Frangipani Silk Arrangement
products.description: Premium silk frangipani blooms artfully arranged with natural dried palm leaves and river stones. This maintenance-free arrangement captures the eternal beauty of tropical Sri Lankan gardens.

products.name: Handloom Cotton Table Runner
products.description: Woven on traditional handlooms using organic cotton threads and natural dyes from indigenous plants. This elegant runner showcases centuries-old textile techniques in contemporary design.

products.name: Ebony Meditation Buddha
products.description: Masterfully sculpted from rare ebony wood, this serene Buddha statue radiates peace and contemplation. Each curve and expression reflects the devotion of master artisans trained in temple arts.

products.name: Colonial Era Chandelier
products.description: A breathtaking brass chandelier inspired by Dutch colonial architecture with hand-blown glass shades. This statement lighting piece brings historical grandeur and warm ambiance to elegant interiors.

products.name: Celadon Serving Platter
products.description: A stunning celadon-glazed platter with subtle crackle finish and botanical engravings. This artisanal piece elevates every dining experience with its understated elegance and timeless appeal.

products.name: Coconut Shell Wall Hanging
products.description: An eco-friendly wall art piece crafted from polished coconut shells arranged in geometric patterns. This sustainable decor celebrates Sri Lankan ingenuity in transforming natural materials into contemporary art.

products.name: Batik Silk Cushion Cover
products.description: Hand-dyed using traditional batik techniques with vibrant peacock and floral motifs on pure silk. This luxurious cushion cover adds a splash of Sri Lankan artistry to any living space.
